title: PRISTINE Watch Face
developerAddress:

Bangur Nagar
Goregaon West

description: Pristine is a watch face for android wear powered smart watches. It shows time, date, day. month, watch battery etc.There are 10 color options which can be accessed by long pressing the watch face on watch and then clicking the settings icon. This watch face works with both round and square display.Please contact us if you find any difficulty/problem or have any suggestion  :).
descriptionHTML:
Pristine is a watch face for android wear powered smart watches. It shows time, date, day. month, watch battery etc.

There are 10 color options which can be accessed by long pressing the watch face on watch and then clicking the settings icon.

This watch face works with both round and square display.

Please contact us if you find any difficulty/problem or have any suggestion :).
comments: How to make it work with moto 360? I installed it but can't see it to add it to my moto 360
Very clean, lightweight watch face. You get the basic features you need in a watch: time (with second hand) day and date, plus a smartwatch essential: its power level. Nice!
Wish I could remove the logo It's a bit jagged on Moto 360 1st gen.
Simply a basic watchface. Battery life is good. Would be easier to change colors in the Android Wear app, not on the watch. Also, color change is very subtle, pink is very close to Red.
Nexus 5x SW3 ASUS Tab 7.0 Xperia Z Tab 3 Very nice thank you.
Almost 5 star Would have been 5 without the logo....too bad
